title: Wage Theft
description: Wage theft occurs any time an employer does not pay an employee everything the employee is owed by law.

title: Child Labor
description: The exploitation of children through any form of work that deprives children of their childhood, interferes with their ability to attend regular school, and is mentally, physically, socially and morally harmful.

title: Occupational Safety and Health
description: Deals with all aspects of health and safety in the workplace.

title: Immigrant Resources
description: The Immigration and Nationality Act protects employees from being descriminated against because of their legal status in the US.

title: Workers' Rights
description: Legal rights and human rights relating to labor relations between workers and employers.
